commit message:
Port pixel conversion code from Dalvik to native for a big performance gain.

Between the native code's advantage on math and now converting the buffer in
place, the result is a 60% speedup.
Fix an incorrect bitshift that was breaking color on 16-bit devices. Remove dead code.
Allow the config window to scroll.
Add customizable notification by any of toast, sound, and vibration.
Reduce vibe notification time from 300 ms to 175. It's less annoying.
